name: Last Commando Strike
description:
Last Commando Assassin 3D is sniper silent assassin commando war designed for shooting action gamers willing to play top fps thrilling action packed game with challenging missions in special sniper war to show gorilla commando skills. Army commando shooting 3D commando death shooter game is aiming to destructible the enemies also offer you to enjoy thrilling warzone in real modern combat arena and it simulates an elite fury commando battlefield against enemies. It is the top 3D fps game with killshots bravo in combat arena and super sniper simulation. Perform secret agent sniper commando shooting adventure to show specialized sniper skills like a military assassin in battlefield with thrilling and brutal sniper missions. Deadly assassin sniper commando game is all about shooting & counters attack with strategy. Start fighting in real time modern combat arena with gorilla commando skills. Be headshot killer by using sniper killshots skills. A sniper headshot will be the best approach to infiltrate into enemy base guarded by watch tower defense. City sniper silent killing adventure is complete sniper shooting game including elite fury sniper shooting techniques within commando fps environment.
Enjoy modern warzone with warrior city assassin sniper in the most dangerous mission. Fulfill sniper assassin’s creed in this sniper commando mission provided with abundant latest ammunition and best possible killshots. Shoot to kill bloody enemy. Prove your gorilla commando skills in SWAT sniper mission commando duty as Last Commando Assassin. Commando soldier! You are the last hope in thrilling action game with killshots bravo on modern warfare. Advanced sniper shooting game with top fps action to take sniper killshots like elite fury sniper to thrill, aim and shot at bloody army. Ambush and kill the enemies before they kill you. Jump in the heat of battle and push your device to the limit! A true commando urge for combat battlefield strike as Last Commando Assassin is to use ultimate talent of army strategies and killing enemies through gunshots by standing on frontline. 3D counter commando modern strike is a full action game with loads of challenges and enemy strike. Show yourself as a real army commando fury warrior and top commando fighter for frontline counter fight battleground commando and get ready with every step for combat commando battleground sniper modern shooting in action packed Last Commando Assassin Mission. Become an epic assassin sniper worrier with you marksmen skills in commando duty top sniper mission strike.
Game Play:
- Move upward, downward, left or right with joystick control
-Touch & drag anywhere on the screen aim your shooting weapon
-Tap the fire button on the screen to start shooting
-Use sniper telescope for zooming enemies at distant
Features of Last Commando Assassin Game:
-Extreme shooting action with real effects
-Breathtaking realistic visuals
-Realistic FPS (First Person Shooter) scenario
-Efficient weapon controls & movement
-Stunning 3D high definition quality graphics
-Realistic shooting and explosive sounds
-Game with User friendly GUI and controls
-Excellent AI and physics applied
